public class CompanyService
extends Client

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Specified by:
      login in class Client

    • addCoupon

      public void addCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CouponSystemException
      Adding new coupon to company.
      Parameters:
      coupon - - to be add to company
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if the expire date had passed.

      2) if company does not exists.

      3) if coupon title already exists in the same company.

      4)or if adding coupon to DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • updateCoupon

      public void updateCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CouponSystemException
      Updating an exist coupon belongs to selected company.
      Parameters:
      coupon - - to update according to the current fields
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if coupon doesn't exist

      2) if coupon doesn't belongs to the selected company.

      3) if coupon's title already exists in another coupon.

      4) if validity isn't valid.

      5)or if update coupon to DataBase failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is error or Error filling in fields.

    • deleteCoupon

      public void deleteCoupon​(int couponId) throws CouponSystemException
      Delete coupon and all the belongs to.
      Parameters:
      couponId - - to delete coupon and the belongs to by.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - -

      1) if coupon does not exist

      2) if delete coupon failed caused by SQL exception, Error access to DataBase or Error filling in fields.

    • getAllCompanyCoupons

      public java.util.List<Coupon> getAllCompanyCoupons() throws CouponSystemException
      Getting a list of all coupons exist in DataBase and belong to this company.
      Returns:
      List - a list of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if there's no coupon belongs to this company in DataBase, or if getting coupons failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is Error.

    • getCouponByCategory

      public java.util.List<Coupon> getCouponByCategory​(Category category) throws CouponSystemException
      Getting a list of all coupons on specific category exist in DataBase and belong to this company.
      Parameters:
      category - - to sort by.
      Returns:
      List - a list of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if there's no coupon belongs to this company or on this category in DataBase, or if getting coupons failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is Error.

    • getCouponByPrice

      public java.util.List<Coupon> getCouponByPrice​(double price) throws CouponSystemException
      Getting a list of all coupons which price lower than given price exist in DataBase and belong to this company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - - of the company to sort by.
      category - - to sort by.
      Returns:
      List - a list of coupons.
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if there's no coupon belongs to this company or on this category in DataBase, or if getting coupons failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is Error.

    • gatDetails

      public Company gatDetails() throws CouponSystemException
      Get company details.
      Returns:
      Company
      Throws:
      CouponSystemException - - if getting company failed caused by SQL Exception or DataBase access is Error.
